text: @PMOIndia @narendramodi The novel coronavirus pandemic has spread like wildfire all over the world, and yet there's hardly any means known to humankind to actually battle the outbreak apart from being Self Quarantine. In this epidemic of COVID-19,  let’s continue staying at home for our loved ones. https://t.co/U677lRYTOR
